dependencies.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.
dependencies.name: py-black

dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.
dependencies.name: py-click

dependencies.description:
Flake8 is a wrapper around PyFlakes, pep8 and Ned Batchelder's McCabe
script.
dependencies.name: py-flake8

dependencies.description: A Python utility / library to sort Python imports.
dependencies.name: py-isort

dependencies.description: Auto-generate API documentation for Python projects.
dependencies.name: py-pdoc3

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: Data validation and settings management using Python type hinting.
dependencies.name: py-pydantic

dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.
dependencies.name: py-pytest

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: Twine is a utility for publishing Python packages on PyPI.
dependencies.name: py-twine

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv
